videoJson.name: D-2
videoJson.capacity: Small: 32 minutes Medium: 94 minutes Large: 208 minutes
videoJson.fact1: D2 machines are capable of using either serial digital video or analog video connectors
videoJson.fact2: While its predecessor, D1, used component video, D2 (and its successor, D3) used digital composite
videoJson.fact3: Ampex was awarded a technical Emmy in 1989 for the work on creating this format
